name: Flow
natural_language_description: 这是 Flow 节点。主要用于: Consume Flow API

resource.name: resource
resource.natural_language_description: 参数名: Resource | 默认值: task
available_options: Task (值: task) - Tasks are units of work that can be private or assigned to a list. Through this endpoint, you can manipulate your tasks in Flow, including creating new ones.

operation.name: operation
operation.natural_language_description: 参数名: Operation | 默认值: create
available_options: Create (值: create) - Create a new task
Update (值: update) - Update a task
Get (值: get) - Get a task
Get Many (值: getAll) - Get many tasks

workspaceId.name: workspaceId
workspaceId.description: Create resources under the given workspace
workspaceId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Workspace ID | 作用: Create resources under the given workspace | (必填项)

name.name: name
name.natural_language_description: 参数名: Name | 作用: The title of the task | (必填项)

additionalFields.name: additionalFields
additionalFields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Additional Fields | 默认值: {}
available_options: ownerid (值: None) - The ID of the account to whom this task will be assigned
listID (值: None) - Put the new task in a list ("project"). Omit this param to have the task be private.
startsOn (值: None) - The date on which the task should start
dueOn (值: None) - The date on which the task should be due
mirrorParentSubscribers (值: None) - Whether this task will be a subtask, and this is true, the parent tasks's subscribers will be mirrored to this one
mirrorParentTags (值: None) - Whether this task will be a subtask, and this is true, the parent tasks's tags will be mirrored to this one
noteContent (值: None) - Provide the content for the task's note
noteMimeType (值: None) - Identify which markup language is used to format the given note
parentId (值: None) - If provided, this task will become a subtask of the given task
positionList (值: None) - Determines the sort order when showing tasks in, or grouped by, a list
positionUpcoming (值: None) - Determines the sort order when showing tasks grouped by their due_date
position (值: None) - Determines the sort order of tasks
sectionId (值: None) - Specify which section under which to create this task
tags (值: None) - A list of tag names to apply to the new task separated by a comma (,)

taskId.name: taskId
taskId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Task ID | (必填项)

updateFields.name: updateFields
updateFields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Update Fields | 默认值: {}
available_options: name (值: None) - The title of the task
completed (值: None) - Whether to complete the task
ownerid (值: None) - The ID of the account to whom this task will be assigned
listID (值: None) - Put the new task in a list ("project"). Omit this param to have the task be private.
startsOn (值: None) - The date on which the task should start
dueOn (值: None) - The date on which the task should be due
mirrorParentSubscribers (值: None) - Whether this task will be a subtask, and this is true, the parent tasks's subscribers will be mirrored to this one
mirrorParentTags (值: None) - Whether this task will be a subtask, and this is true, the parent tasks's tags will be mirrored to this one
noteContent (值: None) - Provide the content for the task's note
noteMimeType (值: None) - Identify which markup language is used to format the given note
parentId (值: None) - If provided, this task will become a subtask of the given task
positionList (值: None) - Determines the sort order when showing tasks in, or grouped by, a list
positionUpcoming (值: None) - Determines the sort order when showing tasks grouped by their due_date
position (值: None) - Determines the sort order of tasks
sectionId (值: None) - Specify which section under which to create this task
tags (值: None) - A list of tag names to apply to the new task separated by a comma (,)

filters.name: filters
filters.natural_language_description: 参数名: Filters | 默认值: {}
available_options: include (值: None)
order (值: None)
workspaceId (值: None) - Create resources under the given workspace
createdBefore (值: None) - Select resources created before a certain time
createdAfter (值: None) - Select resources created after a certain time
updateBefore (值: None) - Select resources updated before a certain time
updateAfter (值: None) - Select resources updated after a certain time
deleted (值: None) - Whether to select deleted resources
cleared (值: None) - Whether to select cleared resources

returnAll.name: returnAll
returnAll.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit
returnAll.natural_language_description: 参数名: Return All | 作用: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit | 默认值: False

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Max number of results to return
limit.natural_language_description: 参数名: Limit | 作用: Max number of results to return | 默认值: 50
